author: Thomas Macaulay
title: Israel builds survey-reading AI that predicts coronavirus outbreaks
description: As coronavirus cases in Israel surge past 1,200, researchers in the country are predicting where it will spread next analyzing responses to questionnaires with AI. After members of the public report their condition, algorithms evaluate their answers to connec…
content:
